alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 11:30AM EDT until June 19 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1030 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bonifay, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chipley, Bonifay, Cottondale, Alford, Richter Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill, Kynesville, Holmes County Airport, Steele City, Five Points, Round Lake, Cottondale Airport, Hulaw, Bahoma, Sunny Hills, Poplar Head, Johnson Crossroads and Jacob City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
